summary.value: A tangle of robust branches, whose thorns spread powerful poison.

effects.effect:
You are Resistant to physical damage.

You Receive: @TYPE[affinity physical resistance e:eot i:1 t:source]

You are Resistant to physical damage. Additionally, after a creature hits you with a melee attack, you deal an amount of physical damage to that creature equal to【5 + your Skill Level in Chloromancy】 (after their attack was resolved).

You Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.KHNmbjlLdJOWMhoZ]
Attacker Suffers: @DMG[5+&sl('chloromancy')+5*floor($cl/30) physical]{5 + (SL in Chloromancy)}

You are Resistant to physical damage. Additionally, after a creature hits you with a melee attack, you deal an amount of physical damage to that creature equal to【5 + your Skill Level in Chloromancy】, and then deal an amount of poison damage to that creature equal to【5 + your Skill Level in Chloromancy】 (after their attack was resolved).

You Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.UUwKmAmXaMWdilui]
Attacker Suffers: @DMG[5+&sl('chloromancy')+5*floor($cl/30) physical]{5 + (SL in Chloromancy)} and @DMG[5+&sl('chloromancy')+5*floor($cl/30) poison]{5 + (SL in Chloromancy)}
